lines.text: This started from an abused kid, a battered infant... There's something terrible about...
What are you, sympathizing with this guy?

Absolutely... My heart bleeds for him, as a child. Someone took a kid and manufactured a monster. At the same time, as an adult, he's irredeemable. He butchers whole families to pursue trivial fantasies... As an adult, someone should blow the sick fuck out of his socks...
[pause]
Do you think that's a contradiction, Jack? Does this kind of understanding make you uncomfortable?
I know that I'm not smarter than you.
Then how did you catch me?
You had disadvantages.
What disadvantages?
You're insane.
What about sweating Lecktor?
We tried sodium amatol on him three years ago to find where he buried a Princeton student; he gave 'em a recipe for potato chip dip.
And if one does what God does enough times, one will become as God is.

Look, admit we struck out this month. The lear jet is standing by. The basic lab stuff is on it. You, Zeller, Jimmy Price, the photographer. Anywhere he hits, we can be there in an hour and fifteen minutes. We get the call, we roll. The scene will be fresh. Fresher then we've ever had it.
It's not over yet.
30 P.M., the full moon is happening tonight. Give it up. Forget this month. It's too damn late.
I gave it up! Till you showed up with pictures of two dead families, knowing God damn well that I'd imagine families three, four, five and six. Right?
You're fucking right I did! And I'd do it again!
Great! But don't talk to me about late, pal! I'll tell you when it's too fucking late! Until then, we go as late as I wanna take it!
You're so sly... but so am I.
[Will remembers the recording on the Leeds' answering machine]

[recording]
Hi, this is Valerie Leeds. Sorry, I can't come to the phone right now.
I'm sorry, too.
Save yourself, kill them all!
Dream much... Will?
l'm sick of you, Lecktor. If you've got something to say, say it!
l want to help you, Will. You'd be more comfortable if you relaxed with yourself! We don't invent our natures, they're issued to us with our lungs and pancreas and everything else. Why fight it?
Fight what?

Did you really feel depressed after you shot Mr. Garrett Jacob Hobbes to death? l think you probably did. But it wasn't the act that got to you. Didn't you feel so bad, because killing him felt so good? And why shouldn't it feel good? lt must feel good to God. He does it all the time. God's terrific! He dropped a church roof on 34 of his worshippers in Texas last Wednesday night, just as they were groveling through a hymn to his majesty. Don't you think that felt good?
Why does it feel good, Dr. Lecktor?

lt feels good because God has power. lf one does what God does enough times, one will become as God is. God's a champ. He always stays ahead. He got 140 Phillipinos in one plane crash last year. Remember that earthquake in ltaly last spring?
You owe me awe!
He never regained consciousness. Did you hear the tape?
Yeah. Listen, Bowman just broke the code that Lektor used in the Tattler personal ad. It was the State of Maryland statutes. You need to know what it said right now?
What?
Listen to me, everything's OK, I've taken care of it.
What is it, Jack?

[angry]
Bastard gave him your home address. It said 'Graham home, 3860 DeSoto Highway, Cativa, Florida. Save yourself, kill them all.'

[watching the Leeds and Jacobi films side by side]
And you know you need a bolt-cutter and every other Goddamn thing... Because everything with you is seeing, isn't it? Your primary sensory intake that makes your dream live is seeing... Reflections... Mirrors... Images...

[stunned realization]
You've seen these films! Haven't you, my man?
You want the scent? Smell yourself!
It's just you and me now, sport. And I'm going to find you, God damn it.
You're talking - about doing exactly what you said you'd...
This killing... it's gotta stop.
William... you're gonna make yourself sick or get yourself killed.
[Will Graham releases the jogger he has just mistakenly tackled]

[to the cops]
What you movin' in slow motion for, man? I'm being mugged.
If I really didn't need you to come back, I wouldn't ask.
[to Jack, about the Tooth Fairy]
You think I'm gonna see him standing in the street and say "there he is"? That's Houdini you're thinking of.
Do you know who I am?
I don't want to know who you are.
According to you, I'm a sexual pervert... an animal, you said. You know who I am now?
Yes.
[last lines]

[looking at the turtles in the hatchery]
Hom many of 'em made it!
Most of 'em... Most of 'em made it!
So what are we doing?
The dream. He dreams about being wanted and desired. So he changes people into beings who want and desire him.
Changes?
If our boy imitates being wanted and desired enough times, he believes he will become one who is wanted and desired and accepted. It'll all come true.
Has this case in anyway affected your sex life?
My sex life? Hasn't affected my sex life, it's affected yours. Go fuck yourself.
The Tooth Fairy's gonna go on until we get smart or we get lucky. He won't stop.
Why not?
He's got a genuine taste for it.
Listen, Will, have you seen this week's Tattler?

[scoffs]
It's not on my preferred reading list, Jack.
Yeah, well, uh... your picture's all over the front page.
Who the hell was it? Lounds?
Of course. Who else?
Damn it, Jack! I promised Molly. I promised her!
Have you ever seen blood in the moonlight, Will? It appears quite black.
Tremble.
Do you imply that I'm queer?
God, no.
When are you gonna kill him?
I'm not. It's only my job to find him.
[the subject of Hannibal Lector has been brought up]
What happened?
Well, Lector was attacking college girls, and he killed them.
How?
In bad ways.
Who is it?
It's me.
Who? Who is it?
It's me.

[opens the door]
Oh. Francis?
No. Not Francis. Francis is gone. Francis is gone forever.
[first lines]
We should have talked at the boatyard. You don't wanna talk about it here.
I'm not fallin' all over myself to talk about much anywhere, Jack.
How does working on this case affect your sex life?
Mine? It doesn't affect mine, it affects yours. Go fuck yourself!
[Francis keeps Reba from touching his face]
Take my word for it. I'm smiling.
Hey, I didn't mean to offend you.
[Francis plays a home video of the family he intends to kill]
What are you watching?
Just a little homework.
Has this case in any way affected your sex life?
My sex life? It hasn't affected my sex life, it's affected yours, go fuck yourself.
